reviews.Title: A Good budget phone
reviews.Comment:
Its a descent product.

Pros:
The product is handy you can use it with one hand.
Big battery.
Descent Images from camera.
The display is vivid

Cons:
The fast charger is not at all fast. It takes ages to get it fully charge.

reviews.Title: Just okay
reviews.Comment:
Disappointing Display features. The screen stated to be 6.5 inch. But it looks very small. Further, You tube does not play full screen.
Compared to Lenovo and moto phones, the display is not that crisp and clear.
Almost 21 GB occupied by existing programs and apps.

Camera is good quality.
Speed is good.
Some additional features like scrolling of apps across the screen are useful.
Overall value for money is not that satisfying.

reviews.Title: Just wow!
reviews.Comment: This is an amazing budget phone from Samsung. I loved the specs. Camera quality & picture is crystal clear & sharp. It doesn't blur or distort with slight movement of hands. The touch experience is very smooth without any lag, probably due to 6gb of super memory. Overall 5 stars.

reviews.Title: Simply awesome
reviews.Comment:
Good but battery like 5000 mah but screen on time near about 9-10 hours.
Little bit data 4g issue in this mobile.
Camera is best under 13.7k(buy in offer)
Display is best under 20k.
Back panel looks average.
Speaker is good but little bit vocal sound breaking.
Processor is above good but not good as snapdragon 710.(not for too much heavy games)
Ui is very smooth.
No problem in phone calls.
Dolby atmos is better.

reviews.Title: Highly recommended
reviews.Comment: The phone is really good for average daily use. Excellent design, good battery backup and excellent camera. Although it heats up quite quickly. reviews.Title: Terrific purchase
reviews.Comment: Newly purchased SAMSUNG Galaxy F41(Fusion Green) is excellent in performance and it's appearance is so appealing.I have not yet operated it's Camara and don't know it's performance. A very good mobile phone available in budget price!.And my previous Vivo Zipro exchanged at very reasonable price with the help of Flipkart.Thank you Flipkart and Delhivery Curriers for their speedy and secured delivery in advanced scheduled date. SURESH M(Flipkart plus Member).

reviews.Title: Nice
reviews.Comment:
Good value for money purchase. Positive sides are good display and good battery. Camera is good if we have good light, and terrible in low light conditions. Some use less apps yet good UI. Rest all are good for normal use. Video editing is also smooth if we use full hd footages and lags terribly if we use 4k footages. Overall good for normal usage. Heats up quickly when we shoot videos and put it on charge.
People.with less usage can choose for this. Battery is enough for 1.5 days.

reviews.Title: Nice product
reviews.Comment: Phone needs update at starting after that it works seamless. No TPU case inside , no screen gaurd. If you need any mobile other than Chinese products, You can take this and this is my no.1 choice. Front camera looks good but back camera not looking like 64mp(need some other camera app). I recommend this product only for long term users because of its built quality, brand and most importantly you can get 5 years system update guarantee.

reviews.Title: Good
